scripts.dist-dev: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/jsmediatags.js --detect-globals false -i ./src/NodeFileReader.js -o dist/jsmediatags.js -s jsmediatags -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types transform-es2015-modules-commonjs transform-class-properties transform-es2015-classes transform-es2015-block-scoping ] ]
scripts.dist-watch: mkdir -p dist && watchify src/jsmediatags.js -v --detect-globals false -i ./src/NodeFileReader.js -o dist/jsmediatags.js -s jsmediatags -t [ babelify --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types transform-es2015-modules-commonjs transform-class-properties transform-es2015-classes transform-es2015-block-scoping ] ]
scripts.dist: npm run dist-dev && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --warning_level QUIET --compilation_level SIMPLE_OPTIMIZATIONS --js dist/jsmediatags.js > dist/jsmediatags.min.js
